product_name: Keen Santa Cruz Slip-On Shoes - Boys'
long_description: The boys' Keen Santa Cruz Slip-On Shoes combine cool, casual style with the ease of a slip-on so young adventurers can kick off their shoes when switching from sidewalk to surf. Canvas leather uppers with suede details provide lightweight structure and casual style; canvas linings are soft next to skin. Elastic gore panel across instep ensures a flexible yet secure fit. Nonmarking rubber outsoles on the boys' Keen Santa Cruz Slip-On Shoes deliver reliable traction on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: The boys' Keen Santa Cruz Slip-On Shoes combine cool, casual style with the ease of a slip-on so young adventurers can kick off their shoes when switching from sidewalk to surf.
